original_text: It is true that I am a family-redeemer for your family. But there is another relative who is nearer to your family than I am.
korean_text: 참으로 나는 기업을 무를 자이나 기업 무를 자로서 나보다 더 가까운 사람이 있으니

sentences.original_text: that I am a family-redeemer for your family
who is nearer to your family than I am
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나보다 당신 가문에 더 가까운 친척입니다
